name: Supply Closet
description: The Supply Closet is a small, dimly lit room tucked away in a corner of the reception area. It is cluttered with various supplies and equipment, stacked haphazardly on a [shelf]. You see a [trash can] right next to it.
short_description: A small, dimly lit room filled with various supplies on a [shelf] with a [trash can] next to it.
directions: The Supply Closet is connected to the [Reception Area] to the east.
